title: There is a 90% Chance of Bitcoin ETF Approval by January: Analyst
author: Ikemefula Aruogu
excerpt: According to the famous Bitcoin investor Lark Davis, several analysts believe there is a 90% chance that Bitcoin ETFs will be approved by January. Davis made the statement via a post on X (formerly Twitter) and was supported by other crypto users with a similar sentiment.

title: Binance’s KYC Policies Under Scrutiny After Hamas Accounts Suspended
author: Vignesh Karunanidhi
excerpt: Crypto analyst Adam Cochran sparked debate on X (previously Twitter) over Binance’s know-your-customer (KYC) policies after highlighting suspicious accounts.

title: Here are 6 Reasons to be Bullish on Bitcoin: Crypto Analyst
author: Abdulkarim Abdulwahab
excerpt: Amid volatile market conditions, crypto YouTuber Zach Humphries, in a recent video, revealed the six reasons why he is bullish on Bitcoin. The analysts these reasons underscore Bitcoin’s current position as a market leader in the cryptocurrency space.

title: Should You Short or Long BIGTIME? Expert Suggests Watching This Metric
author: Abdulkarim Abdulwahab
excerpt: In a recent tweet, Lookonchain, a well-known crypto market on-chain resource, highlighted the remarkable upswing in the price of the freshly listed cryptocurrency Big Time (BIGTIME). Specifically, Lookonchain raised a critical query for traders concerning assessing BIGTIME’s price changes, mainly whether to adopt a long or short position.

title: New sFRAX Vault Locks $35 Million Worth Of Deposits In 24 Hours
author: Ross
excerpt: On October 12, Crypto Hedge Fund Ouroboros Capital announced that the decentralized cross-chain protocol, Frax Finance introduced sFRAX, an ERC4626 staking vault, enabling FRAX holders to earn yields equivalent to the interest rate on reserve balances set by the U.S. Federal Reserve (IORB). However, the influx of investor funds into its newly introduced high-yield staking product failed to impact the protocol’s governance token, FXS.

title: FTX Estate is Staking 5.5M Solana Tokens: Whale Alert
author: Ikemefula Aruogu
excerpt: According to Ashpool, an X account renowned for crypto research, FTX estate is staking 5.5 million SOL. In its post, Ashpool referenced another post from Whale Alert showing an SOL transaction between two unknown wallets to the tune of 5,546,217 SOL, equivalent to $121,255,031.

title: Coinbase Slams SEC for Unilluminating Update on Rule-Making Petition
author: Nynu V Jamal
excerpt: Coinbase recently filed a motion in the Third Circuit Court, requesting the court to urge the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) to respond immediately to the long, unsettled rule-making petition submitted by the company. The motion intends to issue a mandamus within 30 days, urging the regulators to deliver an official answer on their acceptance or denial of the petition.

title: Ferrari’s Groundbreaking Move: Accepts Payment in Crypto
author: Nynu V Jamal
excerpt: The Italian luxury sports car Ferrari recently announced its decision to accept cryptocurrency as a means of payment in the United States, shortly extending the scheme to Europe. As per the latest report by Reuters, Ferrari’s groundbreaking move came in response to requests from dealers and individual clients who have largely invested in crypto.

title: Hoskinson on ETHGate: XRP Never Threatens ETH, It Has No Smart Contracts
author: Abdulkarim Abdulwahab
excerpt: The ETHGate scandal, which borders on the allegation of the member of the Ethereum community supposedly bribing officials of the U.S. regulator, is never subsiding as Cardano founder Charles Hoskinson fervently counters the claims from the XRP enthusiasts.

title: This is Not the Right Time to Acquire LUNC: Crypto Analyst
author: Ikemefula Aruogu
excerpt: According to Classy Crypto, a renowned Terra Luna Classic analyst on YouTube, this is not the right time to acquire LUNC, the native token of Terra Classic. Classy Crypto noted his reason to be because LUNC’s current situation is very concerning.
